snippet: Peyton Manning is the only five-time MVP in NFL history, one of the faces of the league and, at 39, the oldest starting quarterback to lead a team to the Super Bowl....
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning is the only five-time MVP in NFL history, one of the faces of the league and, at 39, the oldest starting quarterback to lead a team to the Super Bowl.

headline.main: 50th Super Bowl: Manning's Broncos Face Newton's Panthers
headline.print_headline: 50th Super Bowl: Manning's Broncos Face Newton's Panthers
